full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO CHE LA BRTEN PA'I GSOL 'DEBS BSAM PA LHUN GRUB MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYIMA BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG DPAL BZANG PO LA BRTEN PA'I GSOL 'DEBS BSAM PA LHUN GRUB MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DKA' BCU PA BKRA SHIS TSE RING GIS LHA RDZAS BCAS BSKUL NGOR SNGAGS RAM PA BLO BZANG CHOS 'DZIN GYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
